Info.Title: Hellboy II: The Golden Army
Info.Genre: Action, Adventure, Fantasy, Horror, Sci-Fi, War
Info.Writer: Guillermo del Toro (screenplay), Guillermo del Toro (story), Mike Mignola (story), Mike Mignola (comic book)
Info.Actors: Ron Perlman, Selma Blair, Doug Jones, John Alexander
Info.Plot: The mythical world starts a rebellion against humanity in order to rule the Earth, so Hellboy (Ron Perlman) and his team must save the world from the rebellious creatures.
Info.Awards: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 5 wins & 29 nominations.
